attributes.action: Scrap the Olympics and reinvest the proposed £9bn spend into the NHS and actually try and deliver the promises that they have made.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The news is that the cost of the 2012 Olympic games has increased to £9bn. Chances are (given the governments incompetence) that this figure will increase again. We should ask the Government to scrap this and reinvest the money into the failed promises thatit has yet to deliver (an effective NHS anyone?)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
